name: Sugar Melt Down
description:
Sugar Melt Down is an 1v1 battle arena, local multiplayer, where a couple of marshmallows fight in a arena under heavy rain, with the incoming threat of rising waters! Fight against your foe until the timer runs out, when the water level reaches a critical point. The player with most points, awarded each time your adversary is drowned, wins the match.

IMPORTANT: currently, the game only supports gamepads, no keyboard support yet.

This game was made for the 8th Game Jam hosted in Santa Maria, RS - Brazil.

Made with Unity.
